ticket_title: Add Save/Error Notifications for Pool Management
summary: Pre-existing TypeScript errors in widget and server packages block build verification

failures.error: 38 TypeScript errors in @ghost-greeter/widget test files (unrelated to TKT-043)
25 TypeScript errors in @ghost-greeter/server test files (unrelated to TKT-043)

recommendation: Fix pre-existing TypeScript errors in widget and server test files, or implement selective typecheck/build for only affected packages (dashboard). The TKT-043 changes themselves are correctly implemented and meet all acceptance criteria.
